00015 typedef enum {
00016         PROXY_CONNECTION_STATE_UNSET,
00017         PROXY_CONNECTION_STATE_CONNECTING,
00018         PROXY_CONNECTION_STATE_CONNECTED,
00019         PROXY_CONNECTION_STATE_IDLE,
00020         PROXY_CONNECTION_STATE_CLOSED,
00021 } proxy_connection_state_t;
00022 
00028 typedef struct {
00029         iosocket *sock;
00030 
00031         unsigned short request_count; /* used for max-keep-alive-requests */
00032         time_t last_read; /* timeout handling for keep-alive connections */
00033         time_t last_write;
00034 
00035         proxy_address *address; /* the struct sock_addr for the sock */
00036 
00037         struct proxy_protocol *protocol; /* protocol handler */
00038         void *protocol_data;    
00040         chunkqueue *send; /* encoded stream data that needs to be send to backend server. */
00041         chunkqueue *recv; /* encoded stream data received form the backend that needs to be decoded. */
00042 
00043         proxy_connection_state_t state;
00044         time_t state_ts;
00045 
00046         void *proxy_sess; 
00047 } proxy_connection;
00048 
00049 ARRAY_STATIC_DEF(proxy_connection_pool, proxy_connection, size_t max_size;);

00051 typedef enum {
00052         PROXY_CONNECTIONPOOL_UNSET,
00053         PROXY_CONNECTIONPOOL_FULL,
00054         PROXY_CONNECTIONPOOL_GOT_CONNECTION,
00055 } proxy_connection_pool_t;
